item.title: Jittery Shivers - by Devoid of Joy (speed loopin')
item.dc:creator: Devoid-of-joy
item.description:
I figured SH would be a bit creepier.
I just wanted no room for silence in this one. Some times you just want all the notes all the time I guess.
